resources.string: SaveAnything is an android application which can be used as your personal folder to save any itemms which you need in future. Nowadays with more apps there is no common place to store important text, images, videos from different apps to reuse them later

No content to display
 ClipBoard 
 Save any text by copying it anywhere in your phone. 
 Images 
 Save an image by selecting share option for that image and choose SaveAnything application in applications list
